title: runtime: exits function reads past the end of the status buffer on Plan 9
body:
Since the beginning of May, we see on the Plan 9 builder
that the exits function reads past the end of the status buffer.

```
2015/05/12 08:43:57 Failed: exit status: 'go 2950: 1'
Build complete, duration 14m46.857832429s. Result: error: exit status: 'all.rc 2244: go 2931: 1ï¿½q'
```
